thread.section_title: Take Charge America Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Take Charge America | www.takechargeamerica.org
thread.title: Carol
thread.title_full: Take Charge America reviewed by Carol

author: Carol
title: Carol
text:
We have nothing but great comments for TCA. From the start. We have been treated very professionally. My biggest concern was "Shame on you" feeling for having to seek help for a long term debt issue. we were given support and not discipline. Phone calls with questions were handled quickly and completed on the phone.
I have dealt with one other company, which was totally there for profit. After paying a large monthly fee, we struggled for a few years with wrong information and constant worry. After all this, we were told they were closing and we were on our own again.
My bank suggested TCA and that was a blessing. Now that our debt is paid up, we can start fresh with a brighter future.
